Package jcolibri.method

Class Summary
CBRMethod Method that solves the CBR cycle task by decomposition.
CBRSystemMethod Method that solves the CBR System task by decomposition in Precycle, Cycle and Postcycle.
CloseConnectorMethod Close the connection to the CBRCaseBase.
CombineQueryAndCasesMethod Simple adaptation method.
ConfigureQueryMethod Reads the structure of the case from a file and build a frame dynamically that can be used to introduce the values of the query.
CopyCasesforAdaptationMethod Copies the cases in the context.
DirectCopyMethod Simple adaptation method.
LoadCaseBaseMethod Opens the connection to the CBRCase base and loads all the cases in the context.
ManualRevisionMethod Builds a frame using the case structure file to display the cases in the context to the user.
NumericDirectProportionMethod Simple adaptation method.
NumericSimComputationMethod Computes the similarities between the query and each case in the context.
PostCycleMethod Method that solve the precycle task by decomposition.
PreCycleMethod Method that solve the precycle task by decomposition.
RetainChooserMethod Builds a frame using the case structure file and shows the cases in the context to the user.
RetainComputationalMethod Solves the Retain Task by decomposition.
RetrieveComputationalMethod Solve the Retrive Task by decomposition.
ReuseComputationalMethod Solves the Reuse Task by decomposition.
SelectAllCasesMethod Sets all the cases from the CBRCaseBase in the context.
SelectBestCaseMethod Select the first case in the context and discard the remainders.
SelectSomeCasesMethod Select the first n cases from the context and discard the remainders.
StoreCasesMethod Adds the cases in the context to the CBRCaseBase.
